Reviews.Title: Piece of crap - Don't waste your money!
Reviews.Author: Michael D. Fiorenza
Reviews.Content: This thing is literally the biggest, cheapest piece of crap ever made.  None of the buttons respond to your inputs without multiple tries.  The recording quality is the worst I've ever seen.  I can find literally NOTHING positive to say about this piece of shit.  It is literally useless, and a complete waste of time and money.  Don't bother.  I guess it's really true what they say...  you get what you pay for.
